column5: Wife and I will be fishing White Otter, Clearwater West first week of Aug. Any tips or help will be wellcome.

You should post this on the Canadian site or have the moderator move it. You will have a better chance of getting a responce. I have fished the water you are asking about only one time. It would help if you mention the species of fish you are after and what type of fishing tech. you like to use. Duran

You picked one the most beautiful lakes in Ontario. I've been fishing the lake for over 25 years. What kind of fish are you looking for? Walleyes? Lake Trout?Lots of spots to fish in Aug. Very deep & cold lakesStaying at Browns?
Btw, there no walleyes in Clearwater. Lot's of big ones in White Otter though.
We will be looking for Walleyes, Lake Trout, or anything that will make a good trip.
We will be staying at one of Browns cabins up by the portage to White Otter. 1St week of Aug.
